data.name: Talking Stick
data.passiveDescription: ATK will be increased by {{16//20//24//28//32%}} for 15s after being affected by Pyro. This effect can be triggered once every 12s. All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by {{12//15//18//21//24%}} for 15s after being affected by Hydro, Cryo, Electro, or Dendro. This effect can be triggered once every 12s.
